<Extension()> Public Function UseOpenTelemetry (builder As ChatClientBuilder, Optional loggerFactory As ILoggerFactory = Nothing, Optional sourceName As String = Nothing, Optional configure As Action(Of OpenTelemetryChatClient) = Nothing) As ChatClientBuilder

static member UseOpenTelemetry : Microsoft.Extensions.AI.ChatClientBuilder * Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILoggerFactory * string * Action<Microsoft.Extensions.AI.OpenTelemetryChatClient> -> Microsoft.Extensions.AI.ChatClientBuilder

Docs.param: An optional to use to create a logger for logging events.
An optional source name that will be used on the telemetry data.
An optional callback that can be used to configure the instance.
Docs.summary: Adds OpenTelemetry support to the chat client pipeline, following the OpenTelemetry Semantic Conventions for Generative AI systems.
Docs.remarks: The draft specification this follows is available at . The specification is still experimental and subject to change; as such, the telemetry output by this client is also subject to change.
